content: A regular hexagon has an equal side length and angle measure. The formula to calculate the perimeter of a regular hexagon is given by 6 times the length of one of its sides. Determine the number of sides of a regular hexagon with a perimeter of 36 cm. Provide the answer as a direct output.
A regular hexagon has 6 sides. Therefore, if the perimeter is 36 cm, each side would measure 36 cm / 6 = 6 cm. The number of sides of a regular hexagon is always 6.
